KamaSutra A:Maya Deodorant Spray - 125 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.150

You look back twice just to make sure that you weren’t daydreaming but there you see the wisp of her shadow graze past. It’s not surprising that you’re shocked as you’ve never seen hair that dense and thick or eyes with such an intriguing depth. Her alpine frame and sensual lips haunt your dreams forever and the scent of her Kamasutra A:maya Deo Spray stays with you.

Maya - the illusion is personified in the form of this entrancing fragrance that keeps men on their toes. She is like sand that slides through within the tightest grasp; an enigma that cannot be demystified. An untainted aura that swathes her untouchable being and breathtaking persona she is the woman who you cannot even imagine in your wildest fantasy. Her morning ritual is complete only with a dab of this Kamasutra deo spray after which she experiences what it is to be a subject of desire. This fragrance comes in a thin slender vial that is dipped in stark white and radiates a dull sheen. Beautifully decorated with a colourful illustration of peacocks this deo from Kamasutra turns any woman into a damsel.
